class.name: OpenXRSpatialMarkerTrackingCapability
class.brief_description: Implementation for handling spatial entity marker tracking logic.
class.description: This class handles the OpenXR marker tracking spatial entity extension.

method.name: is_april_tag_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if April tag marker tracking is supported by the current device.

method.name: is_aruco_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if Aruco marker tracking is supported by the current device.

method.name: is_micro_qrcode_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if micro QR code marker tracking is supported by the current device.

method.name: is_qrcode_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if QR code marker tracking is supported by the current device.
